member.name: M:NFCDataRESTApi.Controllers.NFCDataController.PutCardInformation(RESTApi.Models.NfcDataModels.CardInformationModel)
member.summary: Puts a cardinformation to the database.
member.returns: A Message, if writing to the database was successful

member.name: M:NFCDataRESTApi.Controllers.NFCDataController.GetAverage
member.summary: Gets the average for all card properties.
member.returns: A CardInformationModel, which contains the average of each property.

member.name: M:NFCDataRESTApi.Controllers.NFCDataController.GetStatistics(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the statistics of a card owner.

member.name: M:NFCDataRESTApi.Controllers.NFCDataController.GetScannedCardAmount
member.summary: Gets the amount of cards scanned from the arduino.
member.returns: The amount of the scanned cards.

member.name: M:NFCDataRESTApi.Controllers.NFCDataController.GetCardInformationsByID(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the informations of a card by id.
member.returns: The amount of the scanned cards.

member.name: M:NFCDataRESTApi.Controllers.NFCDataController.GetTotalScanAmount
member.summary: Gets the amount of all scans that have been made.
member.returns: The amount of the scanned cards.
